thread.title: ANALYSIS: Sky Poll Alleging Britain ‘More Racist, Less Happy’ Since Brexit is Deeply Flawed
thread.title_full: ANALYSIS: Sky Poll Alleging Britain ‘More Racist, Less Happy’ Since Brexit is Deeply Flawed

author: Jack Montgomery
title: ANALYSIS: Sky Poll Alleging Britain ‘More Racist, Less Happy’ Since Brexit is Deeply Flawed
text: KNUTSFORD, UNITED KINGDOM - MARCH 17: In this photo illustration, the European Union and the Union flag sit together on bunting on March 17, 2016 in Knutsford, United Kingdom. The United Kingdom will hold a referendum on June 23, 2016 to decide whether or not to remain a member of the European Union (EU), an economic and political partnership involving 28 European countries which allows members to trade together in a single market and free movement across its borders for citizens.
